description: Overview:Now carry your mouse in style, freedom, and comfort with the Microsoft® Mobile Comfort Mouse 3000. This ergonomic, wireless mouse is a new addition to the Microsoft line of best-selling notebook mice. It features an updated design with a choice of black or white colors, a battery status indicator, a snap-in receiver for prolonged battery life and easy portability, and performance features—including four buttons—that make your everyday computing at home, school, or work efficient and fun.Features:   ComfortDesigned by ergonomic experts for comfort in either hand. Snap-in ReceiverUse the snap-in receiver to turn off the mouse and extend battery life. 4 ButtonsUse the Back button to easily navigate folders or Web pages, and press the scroll wheel for AutoScroll. Additional Features:Battery Status Indicator:Light indicates when  your battery is running low.Windows® Flip 3D and Magnifier:Additional  productivity features, such as Windows Flip 3D and  Magnifier, are available by software download at  www.microsoft.com/hardware.High Definition Optical Technology:More  responsive, more precise, smoother tracking.  System Requirements:Windows Vista®/Windows XP or Mac OS X v10.2–10.5USB port1 AA alkaline battery required (included)
title: Microsoft Wireless Mobile Mouse 3000 - White
